item.title: Teen dies after being stabbed outside mosque

item.content:encoded: Ethan Slater, 17, and Cherish Bean, 15, died at a holiday park near Bridlington on Wednesday.

item.title: Six races, six golds - Klaebo's historic Olympics

item.title: Bond, bagpipes & controversial Canadians - why curling is must-watch
